name: @eeshdarthvader/open
description: A React component to view a PDF document

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run js && npm run css
scripts.js: cp src/index.d.ts npm && cp dist/index.js npm && rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js
scripts.css: cp -r src/styles npm && rm npm/styles/index.less && postcss npm/styles/index.css > npm/styles/index.min.css
